pages.title: Fat
pages.text: Fat is dropped by $(l:entities/auroch)aurochs$(), $(l:entities/boar)boars$(), $(l:entities/deer)deer$(), $(l:entities/mammoth)mammoths$(), $(l:entities/mouflon)mouflons$(), $(l:entities/saber_tooth_tiger)saber-tooth tigers$(), $(l:entities/woolly_rhino)woolly rhinos$(), cows, pigs, and sheep.
